sections.description: Add the Google Tag Manager & Google Optimize code snippet to your website.
sections.installation: Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin > Activate.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.0 - Initial release.

Version 1.2.0 - Updated plugin checker framework to latest version (5.0). Now using wp_body_open hook (instead of genesis_before) to inject code after opening body tag.
sections.help: After installation, go to GTM Settings page to enter your information and enable the plugin.
